name.baseName: Sheepskin/fine-mixed skins-white wet fur ; White wet fur ; Sheepskin/fine mixed skin ; Chrome-free tanning ; All sizes; NESPS2
羊皮/细杂皮—白湿毛皮 ; 白湿毛皮 ; 羊皮/细杂皮 ; 无铬主鞣 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程涉及无铬鞣制羊皮/细杂皮以生产白湿毛皮，适用于制作各种尺寸的高品质皮革制品，如服装、配饰和家具装饰。此外，该过程整合了先进的尾端处理技术来处理来自磷、氨氮、有机结合氮和化学需氧量(COD)的污染。这些技术包括物理化学处理、好氧生物处理、物理处理和化学处理的组合，确保了污染管理的高技术效率水平。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1931文件，在完整版文件中第2762页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法+好氧生物处理法+化学处理法，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98
